Message.Title: vulture romney taxes
Message.Msg: Mitt Romney says “every year I’ve paid at least 13 %" what kind of creep, cheat & scumbag wants to INCREASE military spending, but personally pays LESS a burden toward that than many in the middleclass? and even MORE disgraceful, Romneyan's tax plan might result in Romney and other vulture capitalists paying close to ZERO burden for the military spending they want to increase.
no way dude...we're going to $40.

Topic.Title: Romney to Ryan: Play it safe

Message.Msg: Romney cautioned Ryan for good reason. Anything a Repub says is twisted, convoluted and re-worked. It wasn't because he has Biden syndrome. Romney knows how Dems can dirty the playing field and that is well documented thru ads and personal attacks. Speaking of playing it safe, Obama is not having many press conferences. Reporters are being shooed. His new strategy is doing the talk show circuit. He wants to avoid any questions about his record. But in 2008 he had the media living on his porch for the daily spin. He muzzled himself for good reason. LOL!

Topic.Title: Unless you are charging that Romney has done something criminal

Message.Msg: and he's likely just paying 13% on EARNED income making it even worse> .................................................................. wrong! Earned income is taxed at a much higher rate. Anyone with a regular job knows that. 13% he paid is on investment income. Capital gains taxed at a much lower rate.

Topic.Title: Obama Is Going Down! Day, By Day, By Day!

Message.Msg: Obama is going down with the 20 somethings. I have a friend whose daughter just graduated from college and she related that many of her co-eds are not finding work in their related fields. They blame Obama. Like most kids their age they were not politically motivated prior to this election. They've gotten a reality check and are now eager to use that vote even if only in protest. Obama is not convincing the next generation that he can meet the challange of putting things right. So far, he's just offered coulda, woulda, shoulda, blaming the other side. That only goes so far and people start to look at what has changed.....worse was not the deal.

Message.Title: thanks for the freebies Romneyann gop
Message.Msg: Ok, Romneyann , you promise me a tax cut, plus social security and medicare AS IS.......is that right? well OK , are you sure? as a boomer who is doing ok, i am amazed that the gop wants to give me another tax cut, plus promise that social security will continue for me AS IS, PLUS promise that medicare will ALSO continue AS IS for ME to pay about 80% of a seniors healthcare costs.........Ryan even trotted out his 78 year old mom to PROVE how medicare friendly he is! wow. did he mention that in the FUTURE younger people will get vouchers that will pay about 30% of THEIR old age health costs..... wow...... and they are expected to continue to pay for most of the boomers FULL medicare that is paying 80% of costs? any here younger than age 55 when romneyann plan could take effect care to comment on YOUR medicare compared to those over age 55 at that time who will get the FULL AS IS medicare ?
